aqd:AQD_ReportingHeader.aqd:changeDescription: This submission updates the original air quality plan for NO2 in the UK submitted in 2011.

base2:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: The Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs, The Scottish Government, The Welsh Government and The Department of Environment - Northern Ireland

ad:AddressRepresentation.ad:locatorDesignator: Atmosphere and Noise, Resource Atmosphere and Sustainability, Area 2C Nobel House, 17 Smith Square, London, SW1P 2AL

aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment.aqd:comment: The source apportionment provided is for NOx. The numerical exceedance provided in I.2.6 (A.2.3) is the measured number of hours that NO2 concentrations exceed the threshold of 200 ugm-3 at the national monitoring station with the greatest number of exceedances of the hourly limit value in the zone.
